summary: The boys get drafted into the Marines. On their first day in basic training, their commanding officer discovers that Sach's dad is an old war buddy of his, so he makes Sach a sergeant and ... See full summary Â»
cast: Leo Gorcey|Huntz Hall|Hanley Stafford|Myrna Dell|Murray Alper|Arthur Space|Tim Ryan|Bernard Gorcey|Gil Stratton|David Gorcey|Benny Bartlett|Paul Maxey|William Newell|Lisa Wilson|Riley Hill|James Flavin|Robert Coogan|Leo 'Ukie' Sherin|Bob Peoples|William Bailey|Stanley Blystone|Paul Bradley|Bob Cudlip|Richard Elmore|Sam Finn|Joe Gilbert|Carol Henry|Alan Jeffrey|Pete Kellett|Perc Launders|Wayne Mallory|Dick Paxton|Suzanne Ridgway|Buck Russell|Cosmo Sardo|George Sawaya|Court Shepard|Milan Smith|Sailor Vincent|Jack Wilson
title: Here Come the Marines
